panels.title: 已提交的全部alpha(包括隐藏和sa)

targets.rawSql:
WITH RECURSIVE date_series AS (
  -- 生成连续的日期序列
  SELECT 
    DATE(MIN(date_submitted)) AS date
  FROM active_alpha_list
  WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
      AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
      AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
      AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
      AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
      AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
      AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
      AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
      AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
      AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
      AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
      AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
      AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
      AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT 
    DATE_ADD(date, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
  FROM date_series
  WHERE date < (
    SELECT DATE(MAX(date_submitted))
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
      AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
      AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
      AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
      AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
      AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
      AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
      AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
      AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
      AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
      AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
      AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
      AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
      AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
  )
),
-- 将原始数据转换为美国东部时间并统计
converted_data AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE(DATE_ADD(
      date_submitted,
      INTERVAL 
      CASE 
        -- 判断是否在夏令时期间
        WHEN (
          date_submitted >= 
          -- 计算当年3月第二个周日的07:00 UTC（夏令时开始）
          DATE_ADD(
            DATE_ADD(
              CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
              INTERVAL 
              (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
              DAY
            ),
            INTERVAL 7 DAY
          ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
          AND
          date_submitted < 
          -- 计算当年11月第一个周日的06:00 UTC（冬令时开始）
          DATE_ADD(
            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
            INTERVAL 
            (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
            DAY
          ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
        )
        THEN -12  -- 夏令时
        ELSE -13  -- 冬令时
      END HOUR
    )) AS submission_date,
    COUNT(*) AS submitted_alphas
  FROM active_alpha_list
  WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL 
      AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
      AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
      AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
      AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
      AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
      AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
      AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
      AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
      AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
      AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
      AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
      AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
      AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
  GROUP BY 1
)
-- 将日期序列与数据左连接，确保所有日期都有显示
SELECT 
  DATE_FORMAT(ds.date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS submission_date,
  COALESCE(cd.submitted_alphas, 0) AS submitted_alphas
FROM date_series ds
LEFT JOIN converted_data cd ON ds.date = cd.submission_date
ORDER BY ds.date ASC;

WITH RECURSIVE date_range AS (
    -- 获取最小和最大日期
    SELECT 
        MIN(DATE(
            DATE_ADD(date_submitted, INTERVAL 
                CASE 
                    WHEN date_submitted >= 
                         CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01') + INTERVAL 
                         ((14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7) + 7 DAY + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                         AND date_submitted < 
                         CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01') + INTERVAL 
                         ((7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7) DAY + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                    THEN -12
                    ELSE -13
                END HOUR
            )
        )) AS start_date,
        MAX(DATE(
            DATE_ADD(date_submitted, INTERVAL 
                CASE 
                    WHEN date_submitted >= 
                         CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01') + INTERVAL 
                         ((14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7) + 7 DAY + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                         AND date_submitted < 
                         CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01') + INTERVAL 
                         ((7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7) DAY + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                    THEN -12
                    ELSE -13
                END HOUR
            )
        )) AS end_date
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
      AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
      AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
      AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
      AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
      AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
      AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
      AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
      AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
      AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
      AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
      AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
      AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
      AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
),
all_dates AS (
    SELECT start_date AS submission_date
    FROM date_range
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT DATE_ADD(submission_date, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
    FROM all_dates, date_range
    WHERE submission_date < end_date
),
daily_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE(
            DATE_ADD(
                date_submitted,
                INTERVAL 
                CASE 
                    WHEN date_submitted >= 
                         CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01') + INTERVAL 
                         ((14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7) + 7 DAY + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                         AND date_submitted < 
                         CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01') + INTERVAL 
                         ((7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7) DAY + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                    THEN -12
                    ELSE -13
                END HOUR
            )
        ) AS submission_date,
        COUNT(*) AS daily_count
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
      AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
      AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
      AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
      AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
      AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
      AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
      AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
      AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
      AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
      AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
      AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
      AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
      AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
    GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT 
    ad.submission_date,
    COALESCE(dc.daily_count, 0) AS "每日提交数",
    SUM(COALESCE(dc.daily_count, 0)) OVER (ORDER BY ad.submission_date) AS "累计总和"
FROM all_dates ad
LEFT JOIN daily_counts dc ON ad.submission_date = dc.submission_date
ORDER BY ad.submission_date ASC;

SELECT 
    CASE neutralization
        WHEN 'NONE' THEN 'None'
        WHEN 'REVERSION_AND_MOMENTUM' THEN 'RAM'
        WHEN 'STATISTICAL' THEN 'Statistical'
        WHEN 'CROWDING' THEN 'Crowding Factors'
        WHEN 'FAST' THEN 'Fast Factors'
        WHEN 'SLOW' THEN 'Slow Factors'
        WHEN 'MARKET' THEN 'Market'
        WHEN 'SECTOR' THEN 'Sector'
        WHEN 'INDUSTRY' THEN 'Industry'
        WHEN 'SUBINDUSTRY' THEN 'Subindustry'
        WHEN 'SLOW_AND_FAST' THEN 'Slow + Fast Factors'
        ELSE neutralization  
    END as Neutralization,
    COUNT(*) as alpha_count
FROM worldquant.active_alpha_list
WHERE neutralization IS NOT NULL
      AND neutralization != ''
      AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
      AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
      AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
      AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
      AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
      AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
      AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
      AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
      AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
      AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
      AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
      AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
      AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
GROUP BY neutralization
ORDER BY 
    CASE neutralization
        WHEN 'NONE' THEN 1
        WHEN 'REVERSION_AND_MOMENTUM' THEN 2
        WHEN 'STATISTICAL' THEN 3
        WHEN 'CROWDING' THEN 4
        WHEN 'FAST' THEN 5
        WHEN 'SLOW' THEN 6
        WHEN 'MARKET' THEN 7
        WHEN 'SECTOR' THEN 8
        WHEN 'INDUSTRY' THEN 9
        WHEN 'SUBINDUSTRY' THEN 10
        WHEN 'SLOW_AND_FAST' THEN 11
        ELSE 12
    END

SELECT 
    Delay_Category,
    alpha_count
FROM (
    SELECT 
        CASE delay 
            WHEN 0 THEN '🔵 无延迟'
            WHEN 1 THEN '🟡 有延迟'
            ELSE '⚪ 其他'
        END as Delay_Category,
        COUNT(*) as alpha_count,
        delay as delay_value
    FROM worldquant.active_alpha_list
    WHERE delay IS NOT NULL
          AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
          AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
          AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
          AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
          AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
          AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
          AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
          AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
          AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
          AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
          AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
          AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
          AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
    GROUP BY delay
) subquery
ORDER BY 
    CASE Delay_Category
        WHEN '🔵 无延迟' THEN 1
        WHEN '🟡 有延迟' THEN 2
        ELSE 3
    END

SELECT 
    DATE(DATE_ADD(
        date_submitted,
        INTERVAL 
        CASE 
            WHEN (
                date_submitted >= 
                DATE_ADD(
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                        DAY
                    ),
                    INTERVAL 7 DAY
                ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                AND
                date_submitted < 
                DATE_ADD(
                    CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                    INTERVAL 
                    (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                    DAY
                ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
            )
            THEN -12  -- 夏令时
            ELSE -13  -- 冬令时
        END HOUR
    )) AS submission_date,
    -- 平均值计算（直接返回，不保留计数）
    ROUND(AVG(is_sharpe), 4) AS sharpe,
    ROUND(AVG(is_fitness), 4) AS fitness,
    ROUND(AVG(is_turnover), 4) AS turnover,
    ROUND(AVG(is_drawdown), 4) AS drawdown,
    ROUND(AVG(is_returns), 4) AS returns,
    ROUND(AVG(is_margin) * 10000, 4) AS margin
FROM active_alpha_list
WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
    -- 确保指标字段不为NULL
      AND is_sharpe IS NOT NULL
      AND is_fitness IS NOT NULL
      AND is_margin IS NOT NULL
      AND is_turnover IS NOT NULL
      AND is_drawdown IS NOT NULL
      AND is_returns IS NOT NULL
      AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
      AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
      AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
      AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
      AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
      AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
      AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
      AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
      AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
      AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
      AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
      AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
      AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1 ASC;

SELECT 
    -- 按月分组：使用 DATE_FORMAT 提取年月
    DATE_FORMAT(
        DATE(DATE_ADD(
            date_submitted,
            INTERVAL 
            CASE 
                WHEN (
                    date_submitted >= 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ),
                        INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                    AND
                    date_submitted < 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                        DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                )
                THEN -12  -- 夏令时
                ELSE -13  -- 冬令时
            END HOUR
        )), 
        '%Y-%m'
    ) AS submission_month,
    -- 月度平均值计算
    ROUND(AVG(is_sharpe), 4) AS sharpe,
    ROUND(AVG(is_fitness), 4) AS fitness,
    ROUND(AVG(is_turnover), 4) AS turnover,
    ROUND(AVG(is_drawdown), 4) AS drawdown,
    ROUND(AVG(is_returns), 4) AS returns,
    -- margin乘以10000转换为万分单位，保留2位小数
    ROUND(AVG(is_margin) * 10000, 2) AS margin
FROM active_alpha_list
WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
      -- 确保指标字段不为NULL
      AND is_sharpe IS NOT NULL
      AND is_fitness IS NOT NULL
      AND is_margin IS NOT NULL
      AND is_turnover IS NOT NULL
      AND is_drawdown IS NOT NULL
      AND is_returns IS NOT NULL
      AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
      AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
      AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
      AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
      AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
      AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
      AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
      AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
      AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
      AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
      AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
      AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
      AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
GROUP BY submission_month
ORDER BY submission_month ASC;

    -- 核心：将年月字符串转换为该月第一天的时间戳
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(submission_month, '-01')) * 1000 as time,
    -- 保留原有的所有指标字段
    sharpe,
    fitness,
    turnover,
    drawdown,
    returns,
    margin
FROM (
    -- 这里是你原有的完整查询，作为子查询
    SELECT 
        DATE_FORMAT(
            DATE(DATE_ADD(
                date_submitted,
                INTERVAL 
                CASE 
                    WHEN (
                        date_submitted >= 
                        DATE_ADD(
                            DATE_ADD(

                            INTERVAL 
                            (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                    )
                    THEN -12  -- 夏令时
                    ELSE -13  -- 冬令时
                END HOUR
            )), 
            '%Y-%m'
        ) AS submission_month,
        ROUND(AVG(is_sharpe), 4) AS sharpe,
        ROUND(AVG(is_fitness), 4) AS fitness,
        ROUND(AVG(is_turnover), 4) AS turnover,
        ROUND(AVG(is_drawdown), 4) AS drawdown,
        ROUND(AVG(is_returns), 4) AS returns,
        ROUND(AVG(is_margin) * 10000, 2) AS margin
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
          AND is_sharpe IS NOT NULL
          AND is_fitness IS NOT NULL
          AND is_margin IS NOT NULL
          AND is_turnover IS NOT NULL
          AND is_drawdown IS NOT NULL
          AND is_returns IS NOT NULL
          AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
          AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
          AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
          AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
          AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
          AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
          AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
          AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
          AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
          AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
          AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
          AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
          AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
    GROUP BY submission_month
    ORDER BY submission_month ASC
) AS monthly_data
-- 外层查询结束

SELECT 
    CONCAT(YEAR(adjusted_date), '-Q', 
        FLOOR((MONTH(adjusted_date) + 2) / 3)
    ) AS Genius_Quarter,
    ROUND(AVG(is_sharpe), 4) AS sharpe,
    ROUND(AVG(is_fitness), 4) AS fitness,
    ROUND(AVG(is_turnover), 4) AS turnover,
    ROUND(AVG(is_drawdown), 4) AS drawdown,
    ROUND(AVG(is_returns), 4) AS returns,
    -- margin乘以10000转换为万分单位，保留2位小数
    ROUND(AVG(is_margin) * 10000, 2) AS margin
FROM (
    SELECT 
        DATE(DATE_ADD(
            date_submitted,
            INTERVAL 
            CASE 
                WHEN (
                    date_submitted >= 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ),
                        INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                    AND
                    date_submitted < 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                )
                THEN -12
                ELSE -13
            END HOUR
        )) AS adjusted_date,
        is_sharpe,
        is_fitness,
        is_margin,
        is_turnover,
        is_drawdown,
        is_returns
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
        AND is_sharpe IS NOT NULL
        AND is_fitness IS NOT NULL
        AND is_margin IS NOT NULL
        AND is_turnover IS NOT NULL
        AND is_drawdown IS NOT NULL
        AND is_returns IS NOT NULL
        AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
        AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
        AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
        AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
        AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
        AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
        AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
        AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
        AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
        AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
        AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
        AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
        AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
) AS adjusted_data
GROUP BY 
    CONCAT(YEAR(adjusted_date), '-Q', 
        FLOOR((MONTH(adjusted_date) + 2) / 3)
    ),
    YEAR(adjusted_date),
    FLOOR((MONTH(adjusted_date) + 2) / 3)
ORDER BY 
    YEAR(adjusted_date),
    FLOOR((MONTH(adjusted_date) + 2) / 3);

                        ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                    )

            AND is_turnover IS NOT NULL
            AND is_drawdown IS NOT NULL
            AND is_returns IS NOT NULL
            AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
            AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
            AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
            AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
            AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
            AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
            AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
            AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
            AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
            AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
            AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
            AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))

GROUP BY submission_year
ORDER BY 
    -- 按年份数字排序
    CAST(REPLACE(submission_year, '年', '') AS UNSIGNED) ASC;

WITH monthly_data AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE_FORMAT(
            DATE(DATE_ADD(
                date_submitted,
                INTERVAL 
                CASE 
                    WHEN (
                        date_submitted >= 
                        DATE_ADD(
                            DATE_ADD(
                                CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                                INTERVAL 
                                (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                                DAY
                            ),
                            INTERVAL 7 DAY
                        ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                        AND
                        date_submitted < 
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                    )
                    THEN -12
                    ELSE -13
                END HOUR
            )), 
            '%Y-%m'
        ) AS month_key,
        YEAR(DATE(DATE_ADD(
            date_submitted,
            INTERVAL 
            CASE 
                WHEN (
                    date_submitted >= 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ),
                        INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                    AND
                    date_submitted < 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                        DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                )
                THEN -12
                ELSE -13
            END HOUR
        ))) AS year_num,
        MONTH(DATE(DATE_ADD(
            date_submitted,
            INTERVAL 
            CASE 
                WHEN (
                    date_submitted >= 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ),
                        INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                    AND
                    date_submitted < 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                        DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                )
                THEN -12
                ELSE -13
            END HOUR
        ))) AS month_num,
        ROUND(AVG(is_sharpe), 4) AS sharpe,
        ROUND(AVG(is_fitness), 4) AS fitness,
        ROUND(AVG(is_turnover), 4) AS turnover,
        ROUND(AVG(is_drawdown), 4) AS drawdown,
        ROUND(AVG(is_returns), 4) AS returns,
        ROUND(AVG(is_margin) * 10000, 2) AS margin
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
        AND is_sharpe IS NOT NULL
        AND is_fitness IS NOT NULL
        AND is_margin IS NOT NULL
        AND is_turnover IS NOT NULL
        AND is_drawdown IS NOT NULL
        AND is_returns IS NOT NULL
        AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
        AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
        AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
        AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
        AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
        AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
        AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
        AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
        AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
        AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
        AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
        AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
        AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
    GROUP BY 
        DATE_FORMAT(
            DATE(DATE_ADD(
                date_submitted,
                INTERVAL 
                CASE 
                    WHEN (
                        date_submitted >= 
                        DATE_ADD(
                            DATE_ADD(
                                CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                                INTERVAL 
                                (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                                DAY
                            ),
                            INTERVAL 7 DAY
                        ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                        AND
                        date_submitted < 
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                    )
                    THEN -12
                    ELSE -13
                END HOUR
            )), 
            '%Y-%m'
        ),
        YEAR(DATE(DATE_ADD(
            date_submitted,
            INTERVAL 
            CASE 
                WHEN (
                    date_submitted >= 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ),
                        INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                    AND
                    date_submitted < 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                        DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                )
                THEN -12
                ELSE -13
            END HOUR
        ))),
        MONTH(DATE(DATE_ADD(
            date_submitted,
            INTERVAL 
            CASE 
                WHEN (
                    date_submitted >= 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ),
                        INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                    AND
                    date_submitted < 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                        DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                )
                THEN -12
                ELSE -13
            END HOUR
        )))
)
SELECT 
    CONCAT(m1.year_num, '-', 
           LPAD(m1.month_num, 2, '0'), 
           LPAD(m1.month_num + 1, 2, '0'), 
           LPAD(m1.month_num + 2, 2, '0')) AS three_month_period,
    ROUND((m1.sharpe + m2.sharpe + m3.sharpe) / 3, 4) AS sharpe,
    ROUND((m1.fitness + m2.fitness + m3.fitness) / 3, 4) AS fitness,
    ROUND((m1.turnover + m2.turnover + m3.turnover) / 3, 4) AS turnover,
    ROUND((m1.drawdown + m2.drawdown + m3.drawdown) / 3, 4) AS drawdown,
    ROUND((m1.returns + m2.returns + m3.returns) / 3, 4) AS returns,
    ROUND((m1.margin + m2.margin + m3.margin) / 3, 2) AS margin
FROM monthly_data m1
JOIN monthly_data m2 ON m2.year_num = m1.year_num AND m2.month_num = m1.month_num + 1
JOIN monthly_data m3 ON m3.year_num = m1.year_num AND m3.month_num = m1.month_num + 2
WHERE m1.month_num <= 10
ORDER BY m1.year_num, m1.month_num;

WITH adjusted_dates AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE(DATE_ADD(
            date_submitted,
            INTERVAL 
            CASE 
                WHEN (
                    date_submitted >= 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ),
                        INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                    AND
                    date_submitted < 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                        DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                )
                THEN -12
                ELSE -13
            END HOUR
        )) AS adjusted_date,
        is_sharpe,
        is_fitness,
        is_margin,
        is_turnover,
        is_drawdown,
        is_returns
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
          AND is_sharpe IS NOT NULL
          AND is_fitness IS NOT NULL
          AND is_margin IS NOT NULL
          AND is_turnover IS NOT NULL
          AND is_drawdown IS NOT NULL
          AND is_returns IS NOT NULL
          AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
          AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
          AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
          AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
          AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
          AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
          AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
          AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
          AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
          AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
          AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
          AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
          AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
),
advisor_periods AS (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN adjusted_date <= '2025-04-10' THEN '普通顾问'
            WHEN adjusted_date BETWEEN '2025-04-11' AND '2025-07-13' THEN '有条件顾问'
            WHEN adjusted_date >= '2025-07-14' THEN '正式顾问'
            ELSE '其他'
        END AS advisor_type,
        adjusted_date,
        is_sharpe,
        is_fitness,
        is_margin,
        is_turnover,
        is_drawdown,
        is_returns
    FROM adjusted_dates
    WHERE adjusted_date IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT 
    advisor_type AS 顾问类型,
    COUNT(*) AS alpha因子数量,
    MIN(adjusted_date) AS 最早日期,
    MAX(adjusted_date) AS 最晚日期,
    -- 平均值
    ROUND(AVG(is_sharpe), 4) AS sharpe,
    ROUND(AVG(is_fitness), 4) AS fitness,
    ROUND(AVG(is_turnover), 4) AS turnover,
    ROUND(AVG(is_drawdown), 4) AS drawdown,
    ROUND(AVG(is_returns), 4) AS returns,
    ROUND(AVG(is_margin) * 10000, 2) AS margin,
    -- 标准差（稳定性）
    ROUND(STD(is_sharpe), 4) AS sharpe_std,
    ROUND(STD(is_returns), 4) AS returns_std
FROM advisor_periods
WHERE advisor_type != '其他'
GROUP BY advisor_type
ORDER BY 
    CASE advisor_type 
        WHEN '普通顾问' THEN 1
        WHEN '有条件顾问' THEN 2
        WHEN '正式顾问' THEN 3
    END;

WITH advisor_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            -- 判断是在成为正式顾问前还是后
            WHEN DATE(DATE_ADD(
                date_submitted,
                INTERVAL 
                CASE 
                    WHEN (
                        date_submitted >= 
                        DATE_ADD(
                            DATE_ADD(
                                CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                                INTERVAL 
                                (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                                DAY
                            ),
                            INTERVAL 7 DAY
                        ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                        AND
                        date_submitted < 
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                    )
                    THEN -12
                    ELSE -13
                END HOUR
            )) < '2025-07-14' THEN '成为顾问前'
            ELSE '成为顾问后'
        END AS period_type,
        is_sharpe,
        is_fitness,
        is_margin,
        is_turnover,
        is_drawdown,
        is_returns
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
        AND is_sharpe IS NOT NULL
        AND is_fitness IS NOT NULL
        AND is_margin IS NOT NULL
        AND is_turnover IS NOT NULL
        AND is_drawdown IS NOT NULL
        AND is_returns IS NOT NULL
        AND (${alphaID:singlequote} = '' OR id = '${alphaID}')
        AND (${is_sharpe:singlequote} = '' OR is_sharpe ${is_sharpe})
        AND (${is_fitness:singlequote} = '' OR is_fitness ${is_fitness})
        AND (${is_returns:singlequote} = '' OR is_returns ${is_returns})
        AND (${is_margin:singlequote} = '' OR is_margin ${is_margin})
        AND (${geniusquarter} = '-' OR ${geniusquarter:raw})
        AND ('-' IN (${type}) OR type IN (${type}))
        AND ('-' IN (${region}) OR region IN (${region}))
        AND ('-' IN (${universe}) OR universe IN (${universe}))
        AND ('-' IN (${delay}) OR delay IN (${delay}))
        AND ('-' IN (${status}) OR status IN (${status}))
        AND ('-' IN (${max_trade}) OR max_trade IN (${max_trade}))
        AND ('-' IN (${neutralization}) OR neutralization IN (${neutralization}))
        -- 可选：限制时间范围，比如只看前后各6个月
        AND DATE(DATE_ADD(
            date_submitted,
            INTERVAL 
            CASE 
                WHEN (
                    date_submitted >= 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        DATE_ADD(
                            CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'),
                            INTERVAL 
                            (14 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-03-01'))) % 7 
                            DAY
                        ),
                        INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 7 HOUR
                    AND
                    date_submitted < 
                    DATE_ADD(
                        CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'),
                        INTERVAL 
                        (7 - DAYOFWEEK(CONCAT(YEAR(date_submitted), '-11-01'))) % 7 
                        DAY
                    ) + INTERVAL 6 HOUR
                )
                THEN -12
                ELSE -13
            END HOUR
        )) BETWEEN DATE_SUB('2025-07-14', INTERVAL 6 MONTH) 
               AND DATE_ADD('2025-07-14', INTERVAL 6 MONTH)
)
SELECT 
    period_type AS 时间段,
    COUNT(*) AS alpha因子数量,
    ROUND(AVG(is_sharpe), 4) AS sharpe,
    ROUND(AVG(is_fitness), 4) AS fitness,
    ROUND(AVG(is_turnover), 4) AS turnover,
    ROUND(AVG(is_drawdown), 4) AS drawdown,
    ROUND(AVG(is_returns), 4) AS returns,
    ROUND(AVG(is_margin) * 10000, 2) AS margin
FROM advisor_stats
GROUP BY period_type
ORDER BY 
    CASE period_type 
        WHEN '成为顾问前' THEN 1
        ELSE 2
    END;

list.definition:
SELECT 
    CONCAT(year_val, '-Q', quarter_val) AS __text,
    CASE quarter_val
        WHEN 1 THEN 
            -- Q1: 冬令时（-13小时）
            CONCAT(
                'date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-01-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 13 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-04-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 13 HOUR)'
            )
        WHEN 2 THEN 
            -- Q2: 夏令时（-12小时）
            CONCAT(
                'date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-04-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-07-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR)'
            )
        WHEN 3 THEN 
            -- Q3: 夏令时（-12小时）
            CONCAT(
                'date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-07-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-10-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR)'
            )
        WHEN 4 THEN 
            -- Q4: 简化处理，分为10月（夏令时）和11-12月（冬令时）
            CONCAT(
                '(date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-10-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-11-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR)) OR (date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-11-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 13 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val + 1, '-01-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 13 HOUR))'
            )
    END AS __value
FROM (
    SELECT 
        YEAR(date_submitted) AS year_val,
        QUARTER(date_submitted) AS quarter_val
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY YEAR(date_submitted), QUARTER(date_submitted)
) AS quarters
ORDER BY year_val, quarter_val;
list.label: GENIUS季度
list.name: geniusquarter
list.query:
SELECT 
    CONCAT(year_val, '-Q', quarter_val) AS __text,
    CASE quarter_val
        WHEN 1 THEN 
            -- Q1: 冬令时（-13小时）
            CONCAT(
                'date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-01-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 13 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-04-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 13 HOUR)'
            )
        WHEN 2 THEN 
            -- Q2: 夏令时（-12小时）
            CONCAT(
                'date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-04-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-07-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR)'
            )
        WHEN 3 THEN 
            -- Q3: 夏令时（-12小时）
            CONCAT(
                'date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-07-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-10-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR)'
            )
        WHEN 4 THEN 
            -- Q4: 简化处理，分为10月（夏令时）和11-12月（冬令时）
            CONCAT(
                '(date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-10-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-11-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 12 HOUR)) OR (date_submitted >= DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val, '-11-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 13 HOUR) AND date_submitted < DATE_SUB(''',
                year_val + 1, '-01-01 00:00:00',
                ''', INTERVAL 13 HOUR))'
            )
    END AS __value
FROM (
    SELECT 
        YEAR(date_submitted) AS year_val,
        QUARTER(date_submitted) AS quarter_val
    FROM active_alpha_list
    WHERE date_submitted IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY YEAR(date_submitted), QUARTER(date_submitted)
) AS quarters
ORDER BY year_val, quarter_val;
